p: Similarly to other EOs, the efficacy of the linalool chemotype of the L. alba EO as a stress reducing agent can change with the concentration and/or species. So, 200 μL⋅L –1 did not change plasma cortisol levels in the hybrid tambacu ( Piaractus mesopotamicus × Colossoma macropomum) subjected to handling compared to control fish (handled as the anesthetized fish) ( Sena et al., 2016). However, anesthesia of tambaqui ( Colossoma macropomum) with 50 and 100 μL⋅L –1 EO of this plant, but of the chemotype citral, did not prevent plasma glucose and ammonia enhancement due to rapid air exposure for biometry ( Batista et al., 2018; Table 1).
